name: WildAcresVR180
description:
Welcome to Wild Acres Amusement Park VR180

This adventurous VR theme park offers thrilling rollercoasters and more. There Ten rides at Wild Acres. To name a few Tigers, Fury this roller-coaster has the characteristics of a tiger, Koala, Koala, Lion’s Den and Like a Giraffe. There are two versions of each ride: Off and ON.

Enjoy your time here… And Have a Nice Day

W.S. Wildlife Syndication

(VR Headset and Motion Controllers are Required)
